dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-appdirs
dependencies.description:
A small Python module for determining appropriate platform-specific
dirs, e.g. a "user data dir".

dependencies.name: py-pytz
dependencies.description: World timezone definitions, modern and historical.

dependencies.name: py-typing
dependencies.description:
This is a backport of the standard library typing module to Python
versions older than 3.6.

dependencies.name: py-backports-os
dependencies.description: Backport of new features in Python's os module

dependent_to.name: py-xrootdpyfs
dependent_to.description: XRootDPyFS is a PyFilesystem interface to XRootD.
